title: Romantic ballads
creator_credit: Castle Films and United World Films
brief_description: Three romantic ballads: 1. ‘Miss you’ by The Four Folks - instrumental and singing group. 2. ‘A Nightingale sang in Berkeley Square’ sung by Tamara with Del Casino Orchestra and girl dance group. 3. ‘It was wonderful then’ featuring Bob Hannon.
